hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) 1-Hour Volume-Weighted Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL regimes, when DOGE or PEPE experiences a 1-hour price move >5% on volume >200% of its 20-hour average but with declining momentum (RSI divergence), entering a contrarian position yields positive expectancy with a 1:2.5 risk/reward profile.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins exhibit high retail participation leading to momentum exhaustion patterns. Volume spikes with RSI divergence signal 'smart money' distribution/accumulation before reversion, especially in neutral markets lacking sustained trends.
entry_conditions: 1H RSI shows bearish divergence (price higher high, RSI lower high) for long setups, or vice versa for short setups

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 61.8% of the 1H move OR +3% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends beyond 1H high/low by 1% OR -1.2% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Win rate <45% OR average win/loss ratio <2.0 across 80+ signals.
